data.sunServiceSchema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="amDataStoreService" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="DataStoreService"  i18nKey="serviceName"  resourceName="DataStoreService"  revisionNumber="1"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/amDataStoreService"  serviceVersion="80eed16e-10ae-4ab6-bf72-0885f16641d8" >
            <Global hideConfigUI="no"  validate="yes" >
                <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="single"  maintainPriority="no"  name="dataStoreContainer"  realmCloneable="yes"  resourceName="USE-PARENT"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                    <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="dataStoreInstance"  inheritance="multiple"  maintainPriority="no"  name="config"  realmCloneable="yes"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                        
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="PositiveNumberValidator"  syntax="string"  type="validator" >
                            <DefaultValues>
                                <Value>org.forgerock.openam.audit.validation.PositiveIntegerValidator</Value>
                            </DefaultValues>
                        </AttributeSchema>
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="RequiredValueValidator"  syntax="string"  type="validator" >
                            <DefaultValues>
                                <Value>com.sun.identity.sm.RequiredValueValidator</Value>
                            </DefaultValues>
                        </AttributeSchema>
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="serverUrls"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="serverUrls"  order="200"  syntax="string"  type="list"  uitype="orderedlist" ></AttributeSchema>
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="bindDN"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="bindDN"  order="400"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" >
                        </AttributeSchema>
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="bindPassword"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="bindPassword"  order="500"  syntax="password"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator" ></AttributeSchema>
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="minimumConnectionPool"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="minimumConnectionPool"  order="600"  syntax="number"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator PositiveNumberValidator" >
                            <DefaultValues>
                                <Value>1</Value>
                            </DefaultValues>
                        </AttributeSchema>
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="maximumConnectionPool"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="maximumConnectionPool"  order="700"  syntax="number"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator PositiveNumberValidator" >
                            <DefaultValues>
                                <Value>10</Value>
                            </DefaultValues>
                        </AttributeSchema>
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="useSsl"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="useSsl"  order="800"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" >
                            <BooleanValues>
                                <BooleanTrueValue i18nKey="i18nYes" >true</BooleanTrueValue>
                                <BooleanFalseValue i18nKey="i18nNo" >false</BooleanFalseValue>
                            </BooleanValues>
                        </AttributeSchema>
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="startTls"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="useStartTLS"  order="900"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" >
                            <BooleanValues>
                                <BooleanTrueValue i18nKey="i18nYes" >true</BooleanTrueValue>
                                <BooleanFalseValue i18nKey="i18nNo" >false</BooleanFalseValue>
                            </BooleanValues>
                        </AttributeSchema>
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="affinityEnabled"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="affinityEnabled"  order="1000"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" >
                            <BooleanValues>
                                <BooleanTrueValue i18nKey="i18nYes" >true</BooleanTrueValue>
                                <BooleanFalseValue i18nKey="i18nNo" >false</BooleanFalseValue>
                            </BooleanValues>
                        </AttributeSchema>
                    </SubSchema>
                </SubSchema>
            </Global>
            <Organization hideConfigUI="no" >
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="policy.datastore.id"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="policy-datastore-id"  order="100"  resourceName="policyDataStoreId"  syntax="string"  type="single_choice"  uitype="unorderedlist" >
                    <ChoiceValues>
                        <ChoiceValuesClassName className="org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.sms.SmsDataStoreChoiceValues" ></ChoiceValuesClassName>
                    </ChoiceValues>
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <DefaultValuesClassName className="org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.sms.SmsDataStoreDefaultValues" ></DefaultValuesClassName>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="application.datastore.id"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="application-datastore-id"  order="200"  resourceName="applicationDataStoreId"  syntax="string"  type="single_choice"  uitype="unorderedlist" >
                    <ChoiceValues>
                        <ChoiceValuesClassName className="org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.sms.SmsDataStoreChoiceValues" ></ChoiceValuesClassName>
                    </ChoiceValues>
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <DefaultValuesClassName className="org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.sms.SmsDataStoreDefaultValues" ></DefaultValuesClassName>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
            </Organization>
        </Schema></Service></ServicesConfiguration>
